description: REM RDI at 4% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in REM sleep associated with >= 4% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of REM sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp4 + hrop4 + carbp4 + carop4 + oarbp4 + oarop4 ) / minremp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Rem RDI at 4% oxygen desaturation
